    • 方法详细资料

      • preApplication

        public void preApplication()
                    throws InstantiationException,
                           IllegalAccessException
        从类复制的说明: WorkerContext
        Initialize the WorkerContext. This method is executed once on each Worker before the first superstep starts.
        指定者:
        preApplication 在类中 WorkerContext
        抛出:
        InstantiationException - Expected instantiation in this method.
        IllegalAccessException - Thrown for getting the class

      • preSuperstep

        public void preSuperstep()
        从类复制的说明: WorkerContext
        Execute user code. This method is executed once on each Worker before each superstep starts.
        指定者:
        preSuperstep 在类中 WorkerContext

      • postSuperstep

        public void postSuperstep()
        从类复制的说明: WorkerContext
        Execute user code. This method is executed once on each Worker after each superstep ends.
        指定者:
        postSuperstep 在类中 WorkerContext

      • postApplication

        public void postApplication()
        从类复制的说明: WorkerContext
        Finalize the WorkerContext. This method is executed once on each Worker after the last superstep ends.
        指定者:
        postApplication 在类中 WorkerContext

      • getMessageBytes

        public byte[] getMessageBytes()
        Get the message bytes to be used for sending.
        返回:
        Byte array used for messages.

      • getNumMessagePerEdge

        public int getNumMessagePerEdge()
        Get the number of edges per message.
        返回:
        Messages per edge.

      • getNumSupersteps

        public int getNumSupersteps()
        Get the number of supersteps.
        返回:
        Number of supersteps.

      • randomizeMessageBytes

        public void randomizeMessageBytes()
        Randomize the message bytes.
